snippet: An Istanbul court ordered that Israel be formally notified of the charges against four former Israeli military commanders over a 2010 raid on a Turkish ship headed for Gaza.
abstract: Turkish court orders that Israel be formally notified of its intent to prosecute four former Israeli military commanders over the 2010 raid on the Turkish ship Mavi Marmara, which was part of a flotilla headed to Gaza in defiance of the Israeli-imposed blockade.

byline.contributor: Isabel Kershner contributed reporting from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: An Istanbul court ordered that Israel be formally notified of the charges against four former Israeli military commanders over a 2010 raid on a Turkish ship headed for Gaza.

headline.seo: Turkey Presses Case Against Israeli Officers in Raid on Ship
headline.main: Turkey Presses Case Against Israeli Officers in Raid
headline.print_headline: Turkey Presses On Over Israeli Raid
